body_text: I don't think that addresses the issue. Somehow, despite us unloading the modules when the add-on is shut down for an update, the modules we import into the browser console are the versions from the old add-on until we restart. I can't quite figure out why.
body: I don't think that addresses the issue. Somehow, despite us unloading the modules when the add-on is shut down for an update, the modules we import into the browser console are the versions from the old add-on until we restart. I can't quite figure out why.
body_html: I don't think that addresses the issue. Somehow, despite us unloading the modules when the add-on is shut down for an update, the modules we import into the browser console are the versions from the old add-on until we restart. I can't quite figure out why.
